summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the municipal sewerage system; authorizing planning, design, and or construction of sanitary sewers within certain designated neighborhoods consistent with Ordinance 96327 and the Sewer Outreach Program--Phases III and IV; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1987 Budget of the Seattle Engineering Department; and making appropriations from the Engineering Department Operating fund reimbursable from the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
